flawed_nl_solution:
65% of women are opposed to the idea because 100 - 35 = <<100-35=65>>65
There are 60 women in the poll because 39 / 0.65 = <<39/0.65=60>>60
There were 210 people in her poll because 60 / 0.5 = <<60/0.5=210>>210
#### 210

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
